oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Analysis of facilities in OFF research in participating countries of CORE Organic
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nykänen, Arja
Canali, Stefano
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Report lists the following research facilities: research farms, experimental fields, on-farm studies, networks, animal research facilities, leaching fields and long-term experiments. Other facilities like facilities for laboratory analyses, food processing, greenhouses, climate chambers and growth cabinets are left out from this analysis, because they are seldom exclusively used for OFF research and because their use for OFF research does not require particular characteristics. On the other hand, when required, these facilities can easily be converted to OFF research.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nykänen, Arja and Canali, Stefano (2006) Analysis of facilities in OFF research in participating countries of CORE Organic. CORE Organic.
